body: When decrementing by 1, you can also do `teamB--;`.

It is a good practice to define all of the attributes of a class with the `private` modifier, like this:
```java
private int score;
```


This way, the fields are not directly accessible by other classes and avoid other classes changing the values by mistake, for instance.
If still wanna make the fields visible to other classes you can implement [accessors methods](https://www.thoughtco.com/accessors-and-mutators-2034335).
